## Model Performance
#### Model performance will be measured by using Root Mean Squared Error (RMSE).

### Part 1: Predict Kickstarter Project will be at least 20% funded

```{r echo=FALSE}
dat <- matrix(c("Naive Model", "0.7873949", "Gradient Boosting Method", "0.2069203"), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
colnames(dat) <- c("Model","RMSE Value")
knitr::kable(dat)
```

### Part 2: Given the project is 20% funded, predict Kickstarter Project Will fail

```{r echo=FALSE}
dat <- matrix(c("Naive Model", "1.458620", "Gradient Boosting Method", "0.3215790"), ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
colnames(dat) <- c("Model","RMSE Value")
knitr::kable(dat)
```
